summary: Provides a Checkov Terraform rule that inspects Yandex Cloud VPC security group resources and flags any ingress or egress rule that allows traffic from any source or to any destination (e.g., 0.0.0.0/0 or all ports), indicating an overly permissive security configuration.
business_intent: Help organizations enforce secure cloud networking practices by preventing open or unrestricted access in Yandex Cloud VPC security groups, thereby supporting compliance requirements and reducing the risk of external attacks.
